Don’t worry,
Eat Happy

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text visibility=”visible-sm” el_class=”main-heading” css=”.vc_custom_1582176039786{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Don’t worry, Eat Happy

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”para-text red-text” css=”.vc_custom_1582176098514{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Now every meal can be a Happy Meal[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”para-text” css=”.vc_custom_1582176076731{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Regardless of your age, McDonald’s promises to invoke the innocence and joy of childhood with our Happy Meals. So, whether you’re with a child, yourself one, or simply passionate about collecting every toy possible, don’t hold back. There’s a new, joyous surprise for you every month. Start collecting now![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”col col-2″ width=”1/2″][vc_raw_html el_class=”toys-raw-shortcode”]JTVCdG95cy1zbGlkZXIlNUQ=[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section full_width=”true” section_id=”restaurants” el_class=”stores-section” sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”row row-1″][vc_column_inner el_class=”col col-1″][vc_raw_html el_class=”store-raw-html”]JTVCc3RvcmUtc2VsZWN0b3IlNUQ=[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section bg_color=”#11a3ba” full_width=”true” section_id=”mcdelivery” el_class=”mcdelivery-section” sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”row row-1″][vc_column_inner el_class=”col col-1″ width=”1/2″][mk_image src=”https://mcdindia.com//wp-content/uploads/2019/12/logo-mcdelivery.svg” image_size=”full” el_class=”mcdelivery-logo”][vc_column_text visibility=”hidden-sm” el_class=”main-heading” css=”.vc_custom_1582176976107{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Order for
Home-Delivered Smiles

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text visibility=”visible-sm” el_class=”main-heading” css=”.vc_custom_1582176993087{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Order for Home-Delivered Smiles

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”para-text grey-text” css=”.vc_custom_1581498162991{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]We deliver to your doorstep[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”para-text” css=”.vc_custom_1584600595186{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]McDelivery allows you to experience delicious McDonald’s food from the comfort of your sofa at home or cubicle in office. All orders are delivered quickly and efficiently, allowing you the peace of mind to know that smiles-inducing food is never too far.[/vc_column_text][mk_button dimension=”two” url=”https://mcdeliveryonline.com/” target=”_blank” el_class=”main-cta”]Order now[/mk_button][vc_raw_html el_class=”partners-raw-html”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”col col-2″ width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section full_width=”true” section_id=”news” el_class=”news-section” sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”main-heading” css=”.vc_custom_1576141557798{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
